title: Understanding Distribution
text: A distribution shows how often each value in a dataset occurs. It helps in understanding the spread and central tendency of the data.

title: Choosing the Right Plot
text: For numerical data, it's important to choose a plot that can effectively show the frequency of data points across different ranges.

title: Histogram Characteristics
text: A histogram is a type of bar chart that represents the distribution of numerical data by showing the number of data points that fall within a range of values (bins).

title: Bar Chart vs. Histogram
text: While both bar charts and histograms use bars to display data, histograms are specifically used for numerical data and show the frequency of data within intervals.
